Title: AI Integration Specialist
Description:
Elgada BPO Solutions Inc. is a growing business solution provider based in the heart of Makati, Philippines. We support the ever-growing demands of our offshore client through software development.

Using our tech expertise and cross-industry experience, we evolve digital transformation into digital acceleration. We deliver full-cycle software development services that adapt seamlessly to project requirements and business needs.

Job Summary:

We are seeking a skilled and innovative AI Integration Specialist to join our growing technology team. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience integrating OpenAI, Gemini (Google's AI), and other generative AI tools into existing systems and workflows. You will play a critical role in designing, developing, and deploying AI-powered solutions that improve business operations, customer experience, and internal productivity.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design and implement end-to-end AI integrations using OpenAI, Gemini, and other large language models (LLMs).
• Build and consume APIs and services to integrate AI functionalities into web and enterprise applications.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business use cases for AI automation and enhancements.
• Build APIs and services to integrate AI functionalities into web and enterprise applications.
• Fine-tune and configure AI models for specific business tasks (e.g., chatbots, content generation, analytics).
• Ensure seamless deployment, scalability, and monitoring of AI systems.
• Develop documentation and user guides for AI-driven solutions.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, Engineering, or related field.
• 3+ years of experience in AI solution development or software integration.
• Proven experience working with OpenAI (e.g., GPT APIs, ChatGPT) and Google Gemini (e.g., Bard, Gemini APIs).
• Proficiency in Python, JavaScript, or other relevant programming languages.
• Strong experience in API development, RESTful services, and cloud-based platforms (GCP, Azure, AWS).
• Familiarity with AI ethics, data privacy, and prompt engineering techniques.
• Ability to work independently and manage multiple AI integration projects.
• Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

Preferred Skills:

Title: AI Specialist
Description:
Gloss (www.glosstech.io) is a successful U.S. Digital Marketing Agency founded in 2007, with a full-time staff in the Philippines since 2008.

We are seeking a full-time highly talented "Rock Star" AI Specialist & Multi-Agent System (MAS) Engineer who can work from home in the Philippines.

This role entails developing and implementing AI-driven solutions for our in-house and client-facing digital marketing and web development projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and multi-agent systems, and with a proven track record of successfully deploying AI solutions in a business environment.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Collaborate with in-house team to ideate, strategize, and develop AI and MAS solutions to enhance our in-house digital marketing and web development efforts.
• Empower us to leverage AI and MAS to create and/or enhance services we sell to clients.
• Stay updated on the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and multi-agent systems to ensure we establish and maintain AI market leadership.

JOB REQUIREMENTS

1. Experience

You must have the following proven experience to be considered for this position (please do not apply if otherwise):
• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field
• Proven experience developing and implementing multi-agent systems and AI solutions
• Prompt engineering
• APIs
• Machine learning frameworks and libraries
• Understanding of synchronous and asynchronous systems
• Logic structures
• Experience in the digital marketing or web development industry is a plus
• Development background is a plus

2. Personality Traits
• Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently, and as part of a team
• Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex concepts to non-technical stakeholders
• Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously
• Excellent analytical and communication skills (verbal and written)
• Extremely strong organizational skills & keen attention to detail
• Natural curiosity and passion for learning and leveraging new technology to optimize results
• 100% commitment to being accountable in your work

EMPOWERMENT

Your efforts will be empowered by the following in-house resources:

1. Technical & Support Personnel
• Marketing
• Project Management
• Frontend/Backend Web Developers
• Web Designers
• Administrative Support

2. CEO Support

Our CEO is a well-respected strategic online marketing expert (www.youtube.com/watch?v=DJ0RWYFRL6Y) who is passionate about empowering our team to learn, grow, and prosper.

He believes in empowerment rather than micro-management; constantly seeks and encourages feedback from team members; and values integrity as the most vital component within the culture of the company.

3. Additional Tools: Leverage our extensive (and ever-growing) arsenal of tools, products, and platforms.

4. Reputation & Credibility

Rooted in our deep commitment to delivering the highest quality work for our clients, as well as our 16 years of experience:

Portfolio: www.glosstech.io/portfolio
Testimonials: www.glosstech.io/video-testimonials

WORK ENVIRONMENT
• You must live in the Philippines (please do not apply if this is not the case as we will not reply).
• You have your own computer and Internet connection (this is a home-based position).
• You are willing to work during U.S. business hours.

COMPENSATION PACKAGE

Our goal is to work with professionals seeking long-term employment. Our competitive compensation packages include the following:
• Base Salary
• Health Insurance HMO
• Guaranteed 100% On-Time Salary Payments
• 13th Month Bonus
• Paid National Holidays
• Paid Leave

If this describes you - and you possess the skills sets we are seeking - then we'd love to have you on board with us!

Title: AI and Analytics Specialist
Description:
We’re looking for passionate and experienced AI & Analytics Specialists who thrive on solving complex problems and unlocking the full potential of data for our customers. If you have a strong technical background in AI, machine learning, and cloud-based analytics platforms, this is an exciting opportunity to drive meaningful change in organizations through data-driven strategies.

In this role, you’ll partner closely with clients to design and implement cutting-edge AI and analytics solutions tailored to their unique needs. Your work will empower them to streamline business processes, make smarter decisions, and discover valuable insights hidden within their data.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
• Customer Engagement: Collaborate closely with customer business and technical teams to understand their data needs and requirements, translating complex data challenges into effective pipeline solutions that drive successful outcomes.
• Data Pipeline Development: Design and implement scalable data pipelines to ingest, process, and transform data from various sources into accessible formats for analysis, ensuring optimization for performance and reliability
• Data Platform Implementation: Oversee the implementation of cloud-based data platforms (e.g., Snowflake, AWS Redshift, Google BigQuery) that enable seamless data storage, processing, and access while ensuring alignment with customer objectives.
• Analytics Platform Solutions Design: Architect and design analytics solutions utilizing data visualization tools and frameworks, ensuring they meet customer goals and enhance decision-making capabilities.
• Data Quality Assurance: Implement best practices for data validation and quality checks throughout the pipeline to guarantee accuracy and reliability for analytics and reporting.
• Cross-Functional Team Collaboration: Collaborate with various teams to understand their data requirements and provide the necessary infrastructure, tools, and support to enable successful analytics and AI initiatives.
• Documentation and Reporting: Maintain comprehensive documentation of data pipeline architectures, processes, and workflows. Regularly update stakeholders on project status, performance metrics, and challenges encountered during development.
• Continuous Improvement: Stay up to date with the latest trends in data engineering and cloud technologies. Identify areas for improvement in data pipelines and platforms, proposing innovative solutions to enhance performance and efficiency.

QUALIFICATIONS
• Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• Experience: Over 5 years of experience in technical roles specializing in AI, ML, and data analytics projects, with extensive experience in cloud environments such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
• Technical Expertise: Proficient in AI/ML tools and platforms (e.g., AWS SageMaker, Azure Machine Learning, Google AI Platform) and analytics services (e.g., AWS Redshift, Google BigQuery, Azure Synapse, Snowflake).
• Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills: Strong ability to analyze data and solve complex technical issues, especially in model performance tuning and deployment optimization.
• Communication: Excellent communication skills, with the ability to translate technical concepts into business value and work effectively with cross-functional teams.
• Self-Starter and Fast Learner: Ability to proactively lead tasks and projects with minimal supervision and adapt quickly to new technologies and evolving requirements.

• Monday to Friday

Title: Cloud Engineer
Description:

• As a Cloud Engineer, you will be reporting to a Chapter Lead, and work closely with fellow Cloud Engineers both within PH and across other countries to design, implement, manage, and deliver solutions in the Public Cloud Domain.

requirements

chapter

subnets, etc.).

Title: Cloud Engineer (Hybrid-Flexible Options) | Manila, PH | Hybrid
Description:
At Broadridge, we've built a culture where the highest goal is to empower others to accomplish more. If you're passionate about developing your career, while helping others along the way, come join the Broadridge team.

Role Overview

We are seeking a skilled and motivated Cloud Engineer to support the design, development, implementation, and operational management of our hybrid infrastructure environments. These environments include on-premises, private cloud, and public cloud platforms, with a focus on AWS. This role is crucial for maintaining the scalability, reliability, and security of our systems as you work collaboratively with a team of engineers.

Responsibilities
• Automation and Efficiency: Contribute to the development and implementation of automation tools and processes to improve system reliability and efficiency.
• Incident Management: Participate in the identification and resolution of system outages and emergencies, and assist in root cause analysis to mitigate future incidents.
• Capacity Planning & System Design: Support capacity planning and system design efforts to ensure infrastructure meets growing demands.
• Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams, including application development, cloud architecture, and platform engineering, to support aligned solutions and operational standards.
• Observability & Monitoring: Assist in optimizing observability tools, such as Datadog, Splunk, and CloudWatch, to gain actionable insights into system performance and health.
• SRE Best Practices: Assist in the deployment of SRE practices, focusing on service level objectives (SLOs), service level indicators (SLIs), and monitoring and alerting systems. Your Profile
• Strong experience with AWS services (e.g., SSM, CloudFormation, ECS, EKS, Lambda).
• Development experience using Java programming language.
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and experience with tools like Jenkins, Chef, Gitlab, or AWS CodePipeline.
• Proficiency in scripting (e.g., Python, Shell) with experience on Linux/Windows platforms.
• Experience with Infrastructure as Code using tools such as Terraform and/or Ansible.
• A proactive mindset with the ability to learn and adapt new technologies. Preferred Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
• 3 to 5 years of experience in site reliability engineering or DevOps related roles.
• Knowledge of microservices architecture and databases such as AWS Aurora/RDS.
• Basic understanding of web technologies and experience with monitoring tools like Datadog or Splunk.
• AWS certification is a plus. Soft Skills:
• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently as well as in a team.
• Effective communication skills, both written and verbal.
• Team-oriented mindset with a willingness to collaborate across global teams.

We are dedicated to fostering a collaborative, engaging, and inclusive environment and are committed to providing a workplace that empowers associates to be authentic and bring their best to work. We believe that associates do their best when they feel safe, understood, and valued, and we work diligently and collaboratively to ensure Broadridge is a company-and ultimately a community-that recognizes and celebrates everyone's unique perspective.

Title: Cloud Engineer (AWS)
Description:
About Arcanys

Arcanys launched in 2010 to help entrepreneurs and innovators from Australia, Europe and other parts of the globe accelerate their software development with dedicated remote engineers from the Philippines (and, more recently, Bulgaria).

Why work with us?

There’s a unique spirit to Arcanys—manifested in our amazing talents, passion for technology, and a strong focus on everyone’s career and personal development. As a company rooted in people, we make a point to offer exciting work opportunities and foster a culture that everyone can meaningfully contribute to.

Join us as a: Cloud Engineer (AWS)

In this role, you’ll get to:
• Implement and manage continuous delivery systems and methodologies on AWS cloud servers
• Understand, implement, and automate security controls, governance processes, and compliance validation
• Architect /operate innovative solutions built on AWS
• Work effectively and communicate clearly with the team on existing incidents until it is resolved, sometimes handing over incidents to the next shift.
• Work with developers to get the proper root cause of related previous incidents

What you’ll need to succeed:
• At least 2 years of experience in provisioning, operating, and managing AWS cloud server environments and with basic knowledge of services such as EC2, Route 53, VPC, Cloudfront, etc.
• Experience in defining and deploying, monitoring, metrics, and logging systems on cloud servers
• Experience in designing, managing, and maintaining tools to automate operational processes
• Must be familiar with Linux operating system, especially CentOS/RHEL
• Experience in Microsoft environments is an advantage. Optional: knowledge of Office 365 / Skype / Lync / Active Directory
• Must be willing to take AWS certification(s) provided by the company within 4 months upon hire

The Perks:

We like to make sure the talent is well taken care of, and here are just some of the benefits you will enjoy:
• Top compensation based on expertise – we are only looking for top talent and pay accordingly.
• Long-term work from home + allowances - we let you work from the comfort of your home + amazing allowances you get to enjoy!
• Standard 5-day work week from Monday to Friday.
• Flexible working schedule. You can choose your working hours (within reason).
• Flat management style and open-door policy - no micromanagement and your voice are being heard!
• Work with the latest technologies - you can hone your skills and work with Australian and European clients + a chance to earn more through our self-training program.
• Enrolment to HMO for a maximum of 3 immediate dependents on your 1st day.
• Incentive-based wellness program.
• Toastmasters, English Classes, and other learning opportunities
• Free consultations with Arcanys registered nutritionist-dietitians.
• Free access to our very own Arcanys CrossFit gym (or get a company-sponsored membership in a different gym, whichever suits your needs best).

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:

Title: ISP Cloud Integration Engineers and ISP Hybrid Cloud Network Engineers
Description:
Guerilla 360 Integrated Solutions is seeking for talented professionals to join our dynamic hybrid team. Interested professionals should be amenable to work twice a week in BGC, Taguig.

We are looking for:

a) ISP Cloud Integration Specialists, and

b) ISP Hybrid Cloud Network Engineers

Kindly refer to the Job Descriptions below:

a) ISP Cloud Integration Specialist

The individual will lead system integration efforts for infrastructure-related projects, provide architectural input for service deployments and optimizations, and collaborate with Technical Architects and cloud providers. Additionally, the role involves managing and prioritizing infrastructure tasks, ensuring adherence to SLAs, and working closely with DevOps teams to execute infrastructure operations. It also focuses on bridging business needs with technical solutions, aligning infrastructure and cloud strategies with broader organizational goals.

Required Tech Stack and Experience
• Minimum of 6 years of experience in infrastructure management and cloud architecture, with a focus on hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
• 3 to 5+ years of experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, and/or Alibaba Cloud, particularly in relation to Kubernetes for managing scalable applications.
• 3 to 5+ years of experience in Linux administration and scripting using Python, Bash, or GoLang.
• 2 years of hands-on experience with Java.
• 2+ years of experience with DevOps tools including GitLab, Argo CD, Jenkins, and Ansible for automated deployments and infrastructure maintenance.
• 2+ years of experience using Terraform for provisioning and managing cloud resources in scalable environments.
• Familiarity with DevOps tools and practices including Terraform, Argo CD, GitLab, and CI/CD pipelines, specifically in the context of infrastructure tasks.

Preferred Qualifications
• AWS and Kubernetes certifications.
• Familiarity with Java for backend integration scenarios.
• Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools such as OpenSearch, ELK, and Prometheus.
• Understanding of API Gateways and Service Mesh technologies.

b) ISP Hybrid Cloud Network Engineer

The Hybrid Cloud Network Engineer will be responsible for managing and supporting a complex network infrastructure spanning both on-premises environments and major cloud platforms—Alibaba Cloud, AWS, and Azure. The engineer will handle network-related service requests and swiftly resolve incidents to ensure optimal network performance and availability. This involves configuring and maintaining a broad set of network components, such as routers, switches, firewalls, VPNs, and load balancers, in both on-premises and cloud settings. The role also includes managing virtual networks, subnets, network gateways, and security groups in the cloud, performing deep troubleshooting using diagnostic tools, and documenting network configurations and resolutions. Collaboration with other IT teams to support deployments and resolve cross-functional issues is a key part of the role.

Tech Stacks and Skills Required
• On-premises Networking Concepts & Technologies – Proven experience required (typically 3–5+ years).

Cloud Networking Platforms:
• Alibaba Cloud – Hands-on experience configuring and managing network services.
• Amazon Web Services (AWS) – Hands-on experience required.
• Microsoft Azure – Hands-on experience required.
• Network Protocols – Strong proficiency in TCP/IP, BGP, DNS.

Network Devices & Services – Experience managing and maintaining:
• Routers
• Switches
• Firewalls
• VPNs
• Load Balancers

Cloud Networking Configuration – Experience setting up:
• Virtual Networks
• Subnets
• Security Groups
• Network Gateways
• Network Security – Working knowledge of best practices and tools.
• Network Troubleshooting – Strong skills using diagnostic and monitoring tools.
• Infrastructure as Code (IaC) – Knowledge of Terraform is a plus.

Soft Skills:
• Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting capabilities.
• Strong communication and interpersonal collaboration skills.

What We Offer at Guerilla 360 Integrated Solutions:
• Competitive salary plus a performance-based bonus
• Work remotely from any location
• System where you can advance the release of your salary and withdraw it real time
• Comprehensive Health & Wellness packages (government mandated benefits, HMO, Leaves convertible to cash, 24/7 Gym access with our gym partner, Accidental & Life Insurance, Dental Coverage, Comprehensive Mental Health and Wellness package, etc.)
• Opportunities for professional growth and advancement within the company
• A collaborative, innovative, and supportive work environment
• Comprehensive training on our products and continuous learning opportunities
• Opportunities for certifications and licensures to boost your career

Title: Engineer, Cloud Operations
Description:
About Trustwave
Trustwave is a leading cybersecurity and managed security services provider focused on threat detection and response. We uncover threats that others can’t and respond quicker than others can to protect against the devastating impacts of cyberattacks. We’re a world-class team of cyber consultants, threat hunters and researchers serving clients in 96 countries. At Trustwave, you can learn alongside the best, make a personal impact on a global scale, and solve new challenges every day. Learn more about us at https://www.trustwave.com.

About the Role
As a Cloud Operations Engineer, you will design, develop, document, and test cybersecurity analytics applications in AWS. There are multiple roles open for various levels of experience. This role reports to the Director, AI Engineering.

You will:
• Employing knowledge of Linux/Unix operating systems to ensure best practices around the installation, configuration, upgrade, patching, maintenance & monitoring of production Linux servers.
• Employing working knowledge of AWS/ MS Azure cloud technologies to ensure operational excellence.
• Managing all aspects of Cloud Infrastructure
• Handle incident, problem and change management in line with ITIL methodology to provide quality support to Trustwave internal customers.
• Management of private/public cloud-based environments through automation & configuration management tools.
• Constantly monitor uptime and diagnose and resolve performance issues across various platforms and products.
• Create and maintain documentation as it relates to systems design, configuration, support and processes.

You Have:
The ideal candidate has 2+ years of hands-on experience of applicable products and tools and can demonstrate working knowledge of the following areas:
• Operation and Management of native components on public cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure.
• Automation techniques and tools through scripting languages (Bash, Python, etc.), configuration management systems (Ansible, Puppet, etc.), and infrastructure tools (Terraform, Foreman/Katello, etc.)
• Docker container-based infrastructure technologies and tools such as service discovery (etcd, Consul), service meshes (Istio, Envoy, etc.), and schedulers (Kubernetes, ECS, Nomad, etc.)
• Installation, configuration & maintenance of Red Hat, Centos, AlmaLinux and other Linux distributions preferably at a large scale.
• Demonstrated experience in the support, monitoring and capacity planning of resources in production environments.
• Highly available and secure systems/environments.

Bonus Points:
• Migration of on-premise infrastructures to a public cloud.
• Big data technologies (Elasticsearch, Hadoop, kafka, NiFi, etc.)
• Networking concepts (routes, subnets, ports, firewalls, etc.) and tools.
• Security concepts and tools.
• Performance monitoring and log management systems (CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, CloudTrail, ELK stack, etc.)
• Programming experience in Java.

General Skills:
• A passion for uptime and security.
• Forward thinking and keeping up with current paradigms and technologies.
• Ability to work with development teams and synthesize infrastructure requirements from application needs
• Ability to successfully balance multiple simultaneous demands & self-adjust to meet shifting priorities
• Excellent English oral and written communication skills
• Willingness to occasionally work scheduled night/weekend times, and to participate in off-hours on-call schedule
• Familiarity with the security industry is desirable but not required

Education
• A high school diploma or equivalent is required; a college or university degree is a plus.

This is a remote opportunity open to anyone legally authorized to work in the Philippines. Guided by our flexible workplace philosophy, Moments That Matter, people gather in the office when in-person interaction is most impactful; full-time remote employees may be asked to travel occasionally based on the needs of the team and the business.

To All Agencies:
Please, no phone calls or emails to any employee of Trustwave outside of the Talent Acquisition team. Trustwave’s policy is to only accept resumes from agencies via the Trustwave Agency Portal. Agencies must have a valid fee agreement in place and they must have been assigned the specific requisition to which they submit resumes, by the Talent Acquisition team. Any resume submitted outside of this process will be deemed the sole property of Trustwave and in the event a candidate is submitted outside of this policy is hired, no fee or payment of any kind will be paid.

Title: Cloud Engineer
Description:
Overview:
As a Cloud Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in driving our organization's cloud adoption strategy. You will focus on designing, implementing, and managing hybrid multi-cloud infrastructures and modernizing our applications to leverage the benefits of cloud-native technologies.

Responsibilities:
• Hybrid Cloud Design: Develop and implement hybrid cloud architectures that combine on-premises and cloud resources to meet business needs.
• Multi-cloud Management: Manage and optimize multiple cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) to achieve cost-efficiency, performance, and reliability.
• Application Modernization: Lead the process of migrating and modernizing legacy applications to cloud-native architectures, leveraging containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and serverless technologies.
• Infrastructure Automation: Automate infrastructure provisioning, configuration, and management using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation.
• DevOps Integration: Collaborate with development teams to implement DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines for efficient software delivery.
• Security and Compliance: Ensure that cloud environments adhere to security and compliance standards, including data privacy regulations.
• Cost Optimization: Identify and implement strategies to optimize cloud costs, such as rightsizing resources and leveraging cost-effective solutions.
• Troubleshooting and Support: Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to cloud infrastructure and applications.

Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or related fields
• Experience: Proven experience as a Cloud Engineer or similar role with a focus on hybrid multi-cloud environments.
• Technical Skills: Strong understanding of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and related technologies (e.g., virtualization, networking, storage).
• Infrastructure Automation: Proficiency in using infrastructure as code tools (e.g., Terraform, Ansible, CloudFormation) for automation.
• Containerization: Experience with containerization platforms (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestrating containerized applications.
• DevOps: Knowledge of DevOps principles and practices, including CI/CD pipelines and automation.
• Problem-Solving: Ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues and find innovative solutions.
• Communication: Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
• Certifications: Preferred certifications (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Azure Certified Solutions Architect, Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Architect).

Additional Skills (Preferred):
• Experience with serverless computing (e.g., AWS Lambda, Azure Functions)
• Knowledge of data analytics and machine learning platforms
• Familiarity with cloud security best practices and certifications (e.g., AWS Certified Security Specialty)

Title: Cloud Solution Architect
Description:
General Duties

As Cloud Solutions Architect for DAC, you will help shape and deliver on a strategy to build our ecosystems in AWS for system integration and application deployment. Your broad responsibilities will include: defining implementation architectures, developing deep expertise in the AWS technologies as well as broad know-how around how applications and services are constructed using the AWS platform; and being a subject matter expert on security as it relates to applications and services.

Detailed Duties
• Participate and drive scoping and technical requirements gathering sessions for cloud solutions
• Provide expert advice on cloud-native and microservices-based application solutions design, development, and resolution of technical issues
• Provide expert advice on building solutions on AWS using third-party tools (such as Terraform, Ansible, Puppet etc.)
• Provide advice on design, integration, and implementation of cloud engineering and operations solutions
• Assist application development teams with cloud environment sizing, design of disaster recovery capabilities to meet the app needs
• Design and implement infrastructure environment provisioning, PaaS and/or entire application stack provisioning on cloud platforms
• Assist application development teams and client executives with management and governance of cloud capability usage and support optimizing the consumption
• Support development and implementation of cloud management dashboards to enable monitoring and governance of cloud platforms
• Design and implement cloud solutions. Able to perform risk assessment.
• Develop design documents for complex architectures and designs.
• Document both high-level and detailed specifications for complex architectures and designs.
• Support proposal development and other pursuit activities
• Provide architecture and proof of concepts for migration exiting application to cloud environment
• Publish whitepapers/point of view and act as an evangelist to DAC in its cloud transformation
• Work both independently or in a team-oriented, collaborative environment based on the project requirements

Professional Eligibility

Certified Cloud/AWS Solutions Architect, with deep knowledge in AWS network, services, security and compute DB (e.g.Redshift, RDS, etc) is a plus

Skills

Working knowledge of software development tools and methodologies.

Demonstrated ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly.

Presentation skills with a high degree of comfort with both large and small audiences.

Strong written communication skills.

High level of comfort communicating effectively across the internal and external organization

Education

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Engineer, Math or related field or equivalent experience

Experience

5+ years enterprise IT experience that includes at least 2 years of hands-on software development, Operations, DevOps engineering, or systems architecture

1+ years of Cloud computing experience using publicly available services

Experience in API Gateway/ESB platforms in AWS

Proven experience in DevOps, systems engineering, build/release/deployment automation, etc.

Experience with Linux administration and scripting

Experience with configuration management, orchestration, and continuous integration technologies such as AWS Config, Cloud Formation, Chef, Puppet, Terraform, Ansible, AWS CLI.

Knowledge of Python, NodeJS and JavaScript

Experience with micro-services and technologies around it, deployment and management.

Professional experience architecting/operating solutions built on AWS.

Responsibility

Cloud Solution Architect will lead the technical team to deliver solutions on cloud platforms. The Cloud Solutions will be involved in building new cloud solutions, migrating an application to co-exist in the hybrid cloud, deploying a global cloud application, or providing design guidance /POC for our managed services team for continuous optimization.

Company: Digital Advantage Corporation

Department: Information Technology Services

To apply please email your updated resume to orlando.pasion@sminvestments.com

Title: AWS Cloud Architect
Description:
- · 5+ years of experience in the design and implementation of complex IT solutions (including scalable cloud-based solutions and microservices architectures) · Experience in infrastructure, database and networking architecture for highly available, Internet-scale applications · Working knowledge of software development tools and methodologies · Presentation skills with a high degree of comfort speaking with CTOs, Enterprise Architects, IT Management, and developers · Strong written communication skills · High level of comfort communicating effectively across internal and external organizations · Technical degree (Computer Science or Engineering) or equivalent experience · Demonstrated ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly
Amazon is continuously striving to be the most customer-centric company in the world. AWS have been helping over one million customers in over 190 countries, from Airbnb to GE, to deliver flexibility, scalability and reliability across their organizations. Behind this success is exceptionally talented, bright and driven individuals who work hard, have fun and make history.” In your role, you will have the opportunity to help shape and deliver on a strategy to build mind share and broad use of Amazon’s utility computing web services within strategic Enterprise accounts. You will represent AWS in face-to-face meetings and own the overall technical relationship between AWS and the customer. This role will engage with enterprise customers across a broad range of industry verticals including Travel and Transportation, Tourism and Leisure, Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG), Pharmaceuticals & Healthcare and Business Services. Technology trends in these verticals include IoT, Big Data, Analytics, AI/ML, Serverless and traditional cloud migrations of compute, storage and associated applications. The ideal candidate will need to demonstrate: · Deep technical skill in infrastructure, software architecture and cloud computing · Customer facing skills, ideally gained in presales or consultancy roles, allowing them to represent AWS in discussions with senior personnel · Demonstrated ability to think strategically about solutions to business, product, and technical challenges. · Awareness of technology trends and how they impact the way businesses consume IT Roles and Responsibilities · Support the AWS Business development team to help formulate a strategy to help the adoption of AWS within the focus industry verticals. · Guide customers to ensure success in building and migrating applications, software and services following the principles of the AWS Well-Architected Framework. · Help educate enterprise customers on the value proposition of AWS, and participate in deep architectural discussions to ensure solutions are designed for successful deployment in the cloud. · Help provide one-to-few and one-to-many training sessions to transfer knowledge to customers considering or already using AWS. · Capture and share best-practice knowledge among the AWS solutions architecture community. · Author or otherwise contribute to AWS customer-facing publications such as blogs and whitepapers. · Build deep relationships with senior technical individuals within customers to enable them to be cloud advocates. · Act as a technical liaison between customers, service engineering teams and support. About the team Diverse Experiences AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying. Why AWS? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. Inclusive Team Culture Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness. Mentorship & Career Growth We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional. Work/Life Balance We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
• Preferred qualifications · 5+ years experience in a customer-facing, sales-aligned role such as consultant, solutions engineer or solutions architect
• Professional experience architecting large scale solutions on AWS
• A Masters Degree in computer science, MIS, engineering or equivalent technical degree
• AWS Solution Architect Certificates; Associates, Developer, Professional.
• Hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. We welcome applications from all members of society irrespective of age, sex, disability, sexual orientation, race, religion or belief.

Title: Cloud Architect IT
Description:
Job Description: Cloud Architect

Overview:

As a Cloud Architect, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing cloud-based solutions that align with our business objectives. You will work closely with various teams to ensure the successful adoption of cloud technologies and optimize cloud costs.

Responsibilities:

1. Cloud Strategy: Develop and implement a comprehensive hybrid multi-cloud strategy that supports the organization's goals and aligns with industry best practices.

2. Solution Architecture: Design and document cloud-based solutions, including infrastruc-ture, applications, and data architectures.

3. Migration Planning: Lead the planning and execution of cloud migration projects, ensuring minimal disruption to business operations.

4. Cost Optimization: Identify and implement strategies to optimize cloud costs, including rightsizing resources and leveraging cost-effective solutions.

5. Security and Compliance: Ensure that cloud solutions adhere to security and compliance standards, including data privacy regulations.

6. Automation and DevOps: Promote the adoption of automation and DevOps practices to improve efficiency and reduce errors.

7. Vendor Management: Manage relationships with cloud service providers and evaluate new technologies and services.

Requirements:

1. Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or related fields

2. Experience: Proven experience as a Cloud Architect or similar role.

3. Technical Skills: Strong understanding of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and re-lated technologies (e.g., virtualization, networking, storage).

4. Architecture: Proficiency in designing and implementing scalable, reliable, and secure cloud architectures.

5. Problem-Solving: Ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues and find innovative solu-tions.

6. Communication: Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, to collaborate ef-fectively with cross-functional teams.

7. Certifications: Preferred certifications (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Azure Certi-fied Solutions Architect, Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Architect).

8. Willing to work on-site in SLMC BGC and/or QC.

Additional Skills (Preferred):

1. Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)

2. Knowledge of serverless computing (e.g., AWS Lambda, Azure Functions)

3. Familiarity with data analytics and machine learning platforms

Title: Cloud Solutions Architect
Description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Cloud Solutions Architect to join our team, specializing in cloud solutions. In this role, you will work closely with sales and delivery teams to engage with potential customers, understand their cloud-related needs, and develop tailored solutions to support their business objectives. Your expertise in cloud technologies, strategic thinking, and communication skills will play a vital role in guiding customers through their cloud journey and driving successful business outcomes.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
• Customer Engagement: Collaborate with local and global sales teams to identify potential customers, understand their business challenges, and uncover opportunities for cloud solutions.
• Cloud Strategy Development: Work with customers to define cloud adoption strategies, migration roadmaps, and modernization plans that align with their business objectives.
• Solution Design: Develop tailored cloud solutions, incorporating migration, scalability, and optimization strategies, ensuring alignment with customer requirements.
• Technical Expertise: Address customer questions and concerns by providing in-depth knowledge of cloud platforms, architectures, and best practices.
• Proposal Development and Presentation: Create compelling proposals, solution blueprints, and presentations that articulate the value and benefits of cloud solutions to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
• Collaboration: Coordinate with internal stakeholders and technology partners to optimize solution offerings and support the successful conversion of opportunities.
• Risk Assessment and Mitigation: Evaluate potential risks and challenges associated with cloud adoption and provide actionable strategies to mitigate them.
• Documentation: Produce clear and detailed documentation to ensure a smooth transition from presales to delivery teams, enabling efficient implementation of proposed solutions.
• Market Awareness: Stay updated on industry trends, cloud technologies, and competitive solutions, and incorporate these insights into customer engagements and solution development.

QUALIFICATIONS
• Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• Experience: At least 5 years of experience in a presales or consulting role, with a strong focus on cloud technologies, solutions, and migrations.
• Technical Expertise: Proficient in cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud, with a solid understanding of cloud architectures, migration strategies, and modernization practices.
• Solutioning Skills: Proven ability to design, document, and present tailored solutions that align with customer needs and business goals.
• Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present complex technical concepts to diverse audiences effectively.
• Proactive Mindset: Self-starter with the ability to anticipate challenges, take initiative, and drive opportunities from discovery to closure with minimal supervision.
• Collaboration: Demonstrated experience working with cross-functional teams, customers, and technology partners to deliver successful outcomes.
• Market Knowledge: Familiarity with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in cloud adoption, migration, and modernization.

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:
• Additional leave
• Company events
• Health insurance
• Opportunities for promotion
• Paid training

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift
• Monday to Friday

Supplemental Pay:
• 13th month salary
• Performance bonus

Work Location: In person

Expected Start Date: 05/01/2025

Title: Cloud Architect
Description:
Company Overview

Founded by experts with more than 70 years of collective experience in the staffing solutions industry, TASQ understands the unique challenges in the talent acquisition space and is committed to being the trusted partner of companies in their pursuit of hiring the best people to fill their manpower needs.

Composed of highly skilled team members who have worked with organizations ranging from small-to-medium entities to large-scale enterprises (including Fortune 500 companies), TASQ is fully capable of meeting staffing demands at all levels and across different industries.

Job Description: Cloud Architect L2

Candidate should have a solid understanding of cloud computing and technology systems, as well as experience designing and transferring applications to the cloud, designing of security and compliance, analyzing and optimizing technology and business processes, managing and implementing, and ensuring solution and operation reliability.
• Demonstrable experience on GCP/Azure/AWS any 2 for below skills: More than one CSP is preferred.
• Design identity and security (Azure AD)
• Design infrastructure (IaaS, PaaS & CaaS)
• Implement and monitor infrastructure (VMs, VNet, VPC, VPN, Load Balancers, Kubernetes, PaaS)
• Conversant with Monitoring tools across clouds such as Azure Monitor, Google Stackdriver etc.
• Design and manage cloud network (network peering, network route management, VPN, Interconnect, Express routes, manage address spaces)
• Knowledgeable on infrastructure components such as Palo Alto firewall, F5 WAF, OS hardening, domain join, VM group policies, etc.

Responsibilities:
• ﻿Create a well-informed cloud strategy and manage the adaption process.
• Regularly evaluate cloud applications, hardware, and software.
• Develop and organize cloud systems.
• Work closely with IT security to monitor the company's cloud privacy.
• Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner.
• Offer guidance in infrastructure movement techniques including bulk application transfers into the cloud.
• Identify the top cloud architecture solutions to successfully meet the strategic needs of the company.
• Analyzing the technology environment and enterprise-specific
• Analysing, documenting requirements, and setting the collaboration framework.
• Creating a solution prototype, participating in technology selection, and controlling solution development.
• Identify access management options and provide recommendations for connectivity to Azure/GCP/AWS AD/B2C AD from the application.
• Strong Understanding of Compute, Network, and Database resources and help with setting up Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery.
• Document Network and Deployment Architecture and define Infrastructure resources.
• Automate the Build and Deployment process of Infrastructure resources using ARM, CLI, Chef, Ansible, Terraform, etc.
• Design and implement VPC/Vnet Connectivity, Network Security Groups, Application Gateway, Web Application Firewall, etc***.
• Define Security Zones and manage environments in Azure/GCP/AWS Cloud.
• Ensure the architecture aligns with the strategy and meets the requirements i.e., Scalability, Reliability, Security, Availability, etc.
• Implement Monitoring of Azure/GCP/AWS Cloud Infrastructure resources to ensure high availability and resource performance management.

Title: AWS Solutions Architect w/ AWS Certifications
Description:
About the Role:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced AWS Solutions Architect to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will possess a strong understanding of AWS cloud services and architecture principles, with a proven ability to design, implement, and manage secure, scalable, and cost-effective cloud solutions. This role requires a blend of technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and effective communication to collaborate with various stakeholders.

Responsibilities:
• Cloud Architecture Design: Design and architect robust, scalable, and secure cloud solutions on AWS, aligning with business requirements and best practices.
• Solution Implementation: Implement and deploy cloud infrastructure and applications using AWS services, including compute, storage, networking, databases, security, and more.
• Migration and Modernization: Develop and execute cloud migration strategies for existing on-premises applications and infrastructure, modernizing them for optimal cloud performance.
• Cost Optimization: Implement cost-effective solutions by leveraging AWS cost management tools and best practices, optimizing resource utilization and minimizing unnecessary expenses.
• Security Best Practices: Ensure security is integrated into all cloud solutions by implementing security best practices, adhering to compliance standards, and utilizing AWS security services.
• Technical Guidance: Provide technical guidance and mentorship to development teams and other stakeholders on AWS best practices, architecture patterns, and service usage.
• Troubleshooting and Support: Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to AWS infrastructure and applications, providing timely support to ensure system stability and performance.
• Documentation and Knowledge Sharing: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for cloud architectures, deployments, and operational procedures, facilitating knowledge sharing and collaboration within the team.
• Continuous Learning: Stay up-to-date with the latest AWS services, features, and best practices, proactively seeking opportunities to enhance technical skills and knowledge.

Preferred:
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate Level (Minimum) or Professional level (Preferred) certification.
• Experience with DevOps practices and tools (e.g., CI/CD pipelines, containerization).
• Experience with database technologies (e.g., relational, NoSQL).
• Experience with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., CloudWatch, ELK stack).

Optional Requirement (Highly Desirable):
• Experience in architecture design and implementation for Edge Computing on AWS. This includes understanding edge device management, data synchronization, and offline processing.

Title: AWS Solutions Architect
Description:
About the Role:
Octal Philippines Inc. is looking for an AWS Solutions Architect to join our innovative team. As an AWS Solutions Architect, you will leverage your extensive knowledge of AWS services to design, implement, and manage scalable cloud solutions that meet our clients' needs. You will work closely with various teams to optimize existing systems and develop new solutions that align with industry best practices.

Requirements:
• o AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate Level (Minimum) or Professional level (Preferred) certification.
• o Experience with DevOps practices and tools (e.g., CI/CD pipelines, containerization).
• o Experience with database technologies (e.g., relational, NoSQL).
• o Experience with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., CloudWatch, ELK stack).

Title: Cloud Architect (Data)
Description:
Founded in 1994 and headquartered in Switzerland, ERNI is a leading Software Development company with over 800 employees worldwide. Specializing in IT and software engineering, we drive innovation in process and technology. Our first service center in Asia Pacific, located in Metro Manila (Mandaluyong), supports clients across Europe, APAC, the Philippines, and the USA. As we continue to grow, we're looking for passionate and motivated individuals to join our team.

Why ERNI is the Perfect Place for You:
• International Exposure: Work with global clients on cutting-edge projects.
• Inclusive Culture: Thrive in a collaborative and diverse work environment.
• Career Development: Enjoy continuous learning and professional growth opportunities.

Perks and Benefits:
• Career Stability: Enjoy a stable career path with ample project opportunities.
• Immediate Coverage: Private HMO and insurance benefits from day one.
• Jubilee Celebration: A 5-year milestone includes a complimentary trip to any European ERNI sites.
• Comprehensive Benefits: Government-mandated benefits including 13th-month pay.
• Skill Enhancement: Access free training and certifications.
• Wedding Gift: To celebrate your special day.
• Baby Basket: To welcome your newborn to the ERNI family.
• Fruit Basket: Boost of vitamins during hospitalization.
• Office Perks: Enjoy free snacks and coffee.

Growth and Opportunities:
• Free Training: Advance your skills through technical and non-technical training.
• Challenging Projects: Engage in complex software projects across MedTech, Industry, Finance, and Transportation.
• Supportive Environment: Benefit from a team dedicated to guiding and supporting your success.
• Recognition and Advancement: Receive acknowledgment for your efforts and opportunities for promotion.
• Open Communication: Experience transparency and value your input in our culture.

Flexibility:
• Hybrid Work Setup: Balance remote and in-person work for better work-life integration.

Events:
• Connect and Celebrate: Participate in a variety of events including leisure, summer, family, social, and year-end gatherings.

What are our wishes:
• At least 3-5 years of experience in Data Governance within a multinational corporation (MNC).
• Proven experience in the implementation of Data Governance for Data Lake/Warehouse projects on the cloud.
• Strong knowledge of Data Governance and Data Quality principles.
• Experience with Synapse, DBT, Redis, Azure Functions (.NET or Python), Python, Azure Data Factory, AWS Glue, RDS, Azure Data Lake, and Power BI.
• Familiarity with DAMA-DMBOK, DCAM, and COBIT frameworks.
• Strong technical, stakeholder, and project management skills.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
• Knowledge of Data Privacy and Protection Laws.
• Experience in writing, reviewing, and establishing frameworks, policies, and procedures.

How can you contribute to the team?
• Lead the design, implementation, and management of data governance frameworks and policies.
• Oversee the development and deployment of data governance solutions using technologies such as Synapse, DBT, Redis, Azure Functions (.NET or Python), Python, Azure Data Factory, AWS Glue, RDS, Azure Data Lake, and Power BI.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
• Conduct workshops and training sessions to ensure stakeholders understand and adhere to data governance policies and procedures.
• Ensure compliance with data privacy and protection laws.
• Develop and maintain documentation for data governance processes, frameworks, and policies.
• Provide technical leadership and mentorship to team members.
• Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in data governance and cloud technologies.

Title: Network Administrator (IT, Philippines: Cebu)
Description:
Our Purpose:

TERADYNE, where experience meets innovation and driving excellence in every connection. We are fueled by creativity and diversity of thought and in our workforce. Our employees are supported to innovate and learn something new every day.
We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.

Opportunity Overview:

Join our dynamic and innovative technology company, where we are committed to delivering cutting-edge solutions and services to our Enterprise. We are seeking passionate and skilled individuals to join our team and contribute to our mission of supporting mission-critical services.

Job Summary: We are looking for a highly skilled Network Administrator to join our Infrastructure Operations team. In this role, you will be responsible for the administration and support of our enterprise network infrastructure, ensuring stability, security, and performance of our network. You will work with the latest technologies and play a key role in managing our LAN, WAN, SDWAN, and network security practices.
• Administer and maintain enterprise network infrastructure, including LAN, WAN, and SDWAN environments.
• Manage and configure advanced routing protocols including BGP, EIGRP, and OSPF.
• Implement and manage Network Access Control technologies.
• Configure and maintain load balancers to ensure optimal network performance.
• Deployment and management of Cisco ACI solutions.
• Manage and support network technologies from Cisco and Aruba.
• Administer wireless protocols and wireless network components.
• Implement and enforce network security best practices to protect our infrastructure.
• Monitor network performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement solutions to ensure optimal network functionality.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support mission-critical services and projects.
• Develop and maintain documentation for network configurations, processes, and procedures.
• Stay up to date with industry trends and best practices to continuously improve our network infrastructure.

All About You:
We seek individuals who share our passion and determination. Our commitment to customer success drives us to go the extra mile. If you’re ready to join us in this mission, take a closer look at the minimum criteria for the position
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• Minimum of 7 years of experience in network administration.
• Strong knowledge of enterprise network environments, including LAN, WAN, and SDWAN.
• Proficiency in Cisco and Aruba network technologies.
• Expertise in Cisco ACI and SD-WAN technologies
• Experience with network security best practices and tools.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure.
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
• Preferred: Networking certifications such as CCIE, CCNP, ACMP, ACCP or equivalent are highly desirable.

We are only considering candidates local to position location and are unable to provide relocation for this position. This position is not eligible for visa sponsorship.

We are an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform crucial job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment.

#LI-CP1

Title: System and Network Administrator
Description:
Job Summary:

The network administrator oversees and maintains the company's computer networks, ensuring they are dependable, secure, and efficient. This job includes installing hardware and software, updating network systems, and implementing security measures to safeguard the network.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Ensuring Network Security
• The network administrator oversees and maintains the company's computer networks, ensuring they are dependable, secure, and efficient. This job includes installing hardware and software, updating network systems, and implementing security measures to safeguard the network.
• Put into practice and oversee network security procedures to protect against cyberattacks, illegal access, and data leaks.
• Keep an eye on network activity and take action in response to security breaches and incidents.
• Perform routine security audits and upgrade security protocols as necessary.

2. Upgrading the Network
• Network upgrades should be planned to increase reliability, scalability, and performance.
• Assess novel technology and suggest ways to improve network performance.
• Plan and implement modifications carefully to minimize interruption during upgrades.

3. Install Hardware and Software
• Hardware for networks, including servers, firewalls, switches, and routers, must be installed, configured, and maintained.
• Configure and oversee network software, encompassing operating systems and apps.
• Verify that every piece of software and hardware is current and operating correctly.

4. Maintain and Troubleshoot Storage Networks
• To guarantee the availability and integrity of data, store networks, and manage them.
• Investigate and fix problems with Network-Attached Storage (NAS) and storage systems.

5. Monitoring Network Performance
• To guarantee peak performance, keep a close eye on network performance.
• Utilize network monitoring tools to find and fix performance problems.
• Make performance reports and offer enhancement suggestions.

6. Configuring Network Hardware
• Set up network hardware according to the needs of the company.
• Make sure that new hardware is configured correctly and integrated with current systems.
• Keep records of all hardware modifications and setups.

7. Maintaining Servers
• Ensure servers run smoothly and the newest patches and software updates are applied.
• Carry out routine maintenance, including updates, backups, and performance optimization.

8. Troubleshooting
• Identify and fix hardware, software, and network problems quickly and efficiently.
• Assist users who are having technical issues with their networks technically.

9. Assembling New Systems
• When necessary, assemble and set up additional computer systems and network components.
• Make sure that new systems are easily incorporated into the current network architecture.

10. Budgeting for Equipment and Assembly Costs
• Create and oversee budgets for purchasing software, network hardware, and assembly.
• Make sure that resources are purchased and used economically.

11. Designing Network Models
• Create and apply network models to maximize scalability and performance.
• Create and update thorough documentation and network diagrams.

12. Maintaining Computer Networks and Systems
• Guarantee the uninterrupted functioning and upkeep of computer networks and systems.
• Update, patch, and maintain the network frequently to guarantee its dependability.

13. Providing Network Administration and Support
• Oversee network systems to make sure they run smoothly and effectively.
• Continue to support any problems or improvements in the network.

14. Providing Technical Support
• Assist employees and users with technical issues by fixing network-related issues.
• Aid in the diagnosis and resolution of software and hardware problems.

15. Repairs and Maintenance
• Handle software and hardware maintenance and repairs for networks.
• Ascertain that every network component is operating accurately and effectively.

Network Administrator Skills:

1. Technical Proficiency
• Comprehensive understanding of servers, firewalls, switches, routers, and other network hardware and software.
• Familiarity with various network management tools and operating systems, such as Windows and Linux.

2. Network Security
• Network security is the ability to implement security measures and keep them under control to keep networks safe from online attacks.
• The capacity to react to security incidents and carry out security audits.

3. Troubleshooting and Problem-Solving
• Strong diagnostic and problem-solving abilities for swiftly and efficiently addressing network problems.
• Analytical abilities to recognize and resolve networking, software, and hardware issues.

4. Monitoring and Performance Optimization
• Proficiency in using network monitoring tools to track and pinpoint performance bottlenecks.
• Capacity to recommend changes and optimize network performance.

5. Management and Configuration
• Expertise in setting up network gear and software to satisfy organizational requirements.
• Capacity to oversee and manage network setups to guarantee efficiency and stability.

6. Backup and Recovery
• The ability to create disaster recovery plans and conduct routine data backups.
• Guaranteeing data availability and integrity by using efficient backup techniques.

7. Technical Support
• Educating users on network-related issues and providing technical support.
• Outstanding customer service abilities to help employees with network issues.

8. Documentation
• The capacity to keep thorough records of network settings, modifications, and practices.
• Proficiency in creating and delivering reports on network performance.

9. Communication Skills
• Written and oral communication proficiency is essential for working with stakeholders and team members.
• The capacity to communicate technical ideas to non-technical users.

10. Project management
• The ability to organize, plan, and implement new installations and network upgrades.
• The capacity to successfully oversee several projects and tasks.

11. Time management
• The capacity to set priorities and use time wisely to fulfill deadlines.
• Ensuring that maintenance chores are finished on time and network issues are resolved.

12. Adaptability and Learning
• A readiness to keep abreast of emerging technologies and market trends.
• The capacity to pick up new skills and adjust swiftly to new tools, processes, and technology.

13. Budgeting and Resource Management
• Proven track record in creating and overseeing financial plans for network projects and equipment.
• Ensuring resource usage at a reasonable cost.

14. Vendor management
• The capacity to collaborate with suppliers on purchasing, upkeep, and supporting equipment.
• Assessing and endorsing novel products and technology.

15. Team Collaboration
• Strong interpersonal skills are essential for collaborating with other IT professionals and departments.
• Capacity to guide and advise team members or junior employees as needed.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresh graduate

Pay: Php25,000.00 - Php30,000.00 per month

Benefits:
• Paid training
• Pay raise

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift
• Day shift

Supplemental Pay:
• 13th month salary
• Overtime pay
• Performance bonus

Work Location: In person

Title: "Network Administrator"
Description:
PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Maintain under operational conditions the current and new network infrastructure and security solutions in respect of the Support processes.

2. Build, deploy and administer/manage the current and new network infrastructure (including WAN, LAN, WLAN and network services/vendors equipment's like NLB, Riverbed, Meraki, F5, Cisco ISE/NAC, Velocloud SD-WAN, SolarWinds) and security solutions (Palo Alto, Checkpoint, Fortinet, Skybox)

3. Senior level of operational support on:

· Troubleshooting, incidents and problem management,

· Reporting and communication on activity, quality and performance of the network platforms and security solutions

· Ensure appropriate documentation, including procedures for support.

4. Assist new implementations of all Network and Security Infrastructure components

5. Pro-active in ensuring stability, response time, operational consistency and life cycle over the network platforms and security solutions

SECONDARY RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Contribute to search and qualification to new solutions.

2. Provide recommendations to the highest level of expertise teams.

PRIMARY TECHNICAL ABILITIES:

1. Preferably CCNP and Palo Alto Certified

2. Administration and troubleshooting of LAN/WAN/WLAN networks

· Routing protocols configuration and troubleshooting (BGP, RIP, OSPF, EIGRP ...)

· LAN technologies administration and troubleshooting (VRRP, VSS, STP ...)

· QoS mechanisms

· Wifi controllers and access points administration (Cisco, Meraki)

· Load Balancer (F5/NetScaler)

· Firewall (Palo Alto, Checkpoint, Fortinet)

· SD-WAN (VeloCloud)

· WAN Compression and Optimization (Riverbed)

· Cisco Meraki (Wireless, Firewalling)

· Telephony Support (Cisco, 3CX)

3. Security Administration with Palo Alto, Skybox, Checkpoint and Fortinet Firewalls, Pulse remote access, Reverse Proxy

4. DNS and Domain Management (Infoblox, IPAM)

5. Authorization and Authentication (Cisco ISE/NAC, Radius, Tacacs)

6. SolarWinds Management (Full lifecyle)

SECONDARY TECHNICAL ABILITIES:

1. Knowledge on Infrastructure Solutions (Servers, Cloud)

2. Knowledge in ITIL framework

System and Network Admin

switching, and VLAN configurations.

Title: Middleware Systems Administrator
Description:
Summary of This Role

Responsible for the activities related to administration, development, installation, and maintenance of applications, infrastructure and integrations for the Endpoint Management and other areas as assigned, as well as for maintaining the area’s technological level up to date and implementing new procedures and techniques. Responsible for collaborative project management, requirements for enhancements, reliability, security, and compliance with company standards, policies, processes and procedures. Experience in managing and maintaining the BigFix application with the ability to branch out into other applications within the team scope. Hold and maintain a proficiency in ITOM technologies and industry best practices.

This position reports to the Manager, Endpoint Management Technology in the Global Technology Services (GTS) Enterprise Logging and Monitoring.
What Part Will You Play?
• Maintain application stability and growth for Endpoint Management
• regular system health monitoring and action plans,
• responsible for activity and progress reports regarding applications systems analysis and programming sections,
• Reviews application and system logs to identify exception errors and performance bottlenecks. Determine the necessary course of action and takes appropriate corrective actions as directed, to include engaging appropriate support groups to apply corrective actions.
• Administer, design and implementation of the BigFix application from HCL (formerly IBM Endpoint Management)
• This includes fixlet creation, patch deployment, software deployment, reporting, application health and the overall application support.
• Evaluates user needs and system functionality in order to ensure that customer-facing production and internal business systems meet the needs of individuals and projects
• Devises or modifies procedures to solve complex problems considering computer equipment capacity and limitations, operating time, and form of desired results
• Collaborates with team members and vendors on the testing and application of patches and/or upgrades
• Outage resolution and performance triage across all tools
• Troubleshoot and resolve technical problems in a timely and accurate manner to improve application performance, availability and functionality
• Developing standards for and/or adhere to existing standards, policies, processes, procedures, governance, compliance and security standards
• Assists with creating and maintaining documentation for the application, changes and upgrades, and maintains compliance based on changes within the industry and/or best practices. Reviews industry documentation and publications to begin to identify potential impacts or enhancements and provides feedback to more senior team members and/or management
• Works collaboratively in a team environment with a spirit of cooperation. Maintain good working relationships with vendors, partners and suppliers
• Carries an automatic notification device and is available for after-hours on-call. support
• Maintains regular and predictable attendance at the worksite
• Ability to travel, including worldwide locations

​

Minimum Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, MIS or similar field, and/or equivalent work experience
• 2+ years experience with BigFix product from HCL (formerly IBM Endpoint Management)
• 4+ years experience in application administration and development or production support
• Experience with fixlet creation, patch deployment, software deployment, reporting, application health and the overall application support
• Able to work both independently as well as collaboratively achieving results within established timeframes with minimal supervision
• Strong understanding of server, workstation and network infrastructure and communication
• Ability to manage and prioritize multiple assignments supporting business as usual, user request as well as special projects
• Able to effectively communicate and display a professional, mature attitude in dealing with internal customers, management and personnel across the organization
• Ability to identify and analyze problems quickly, recommend and implement flexible creative permanent solutions
• Excellent attention to detail on multiple simultaneous tasks
• Strong communication (written & verbal) skills required, excellent verbal presentation skills
• General level knowledge of Windows and Linux operating systems and technologies, plus container foundations (ie Kubernetes)
• Solid understanding of technologies that support the services offered
• Willing to learn and apply new technologies and methodologies to improve the technology that supports the services, i.e. API scripting and Structured Query Language
• Ability to travel, including worldwide locations

Preferred Qualifications
• Certification in ITSM/ITIL frameworks
• Familiarity with process optimization methodologies (LEAN, Six Sigma) and project management (Agile, waterfall)
• MicroFocus Service Manager, IBM Control Desk, Service NOW

What Are Our Desired Skills and Capabilities?
• Skills / Knowledge - Developing professional expertise, applies company policies and procedures to resolve a variety of issues.
• Job Complexity - Works on problems of moderate scope where analysis of situations or data requires a review of a variety of factors. Exercises judgment within defined procedures and practices to determine appropriate action. Builds productive internal/external working relationships.
• Supervision - Normally receives general instructions on routine work, detailed instructions on new projects or assignments.

Title: System Administrator- (URGENT HIRING)
Description:
Job Title: Systems Administrator

Key Responsibilities (Additional duties may be assigned):
• Manage and monitor server and workstation systems to ensure maximum performance, uptime, and reliability.
• Install, configure, and perform system upgrades for both Windows and UNIX/Linux-based platforms and servers.
• Work closely with LAN/Network teams to guarantee seamless integration with LAN applications and peripheral devices, fostering a stable and efficient work environment for end users.
• Apply system patches and updates as necessary, overseeing backup and recovery operations to ensure High Availability of critical systems.
• Troubleshoot and resolve hardware-related issues, coordinating the installation and testing of computer peripherals.
• Provide technical expertise and support during system deployments and project-related initiatives.
• Research, evaluate, and recommend hardware and software solutions to address both immediate and future organizational needs.
• Collaborate with IT colleagues, vendors, and suppliers to assist with troubleshooting, data collection, root cause analysis, technical support, and resolution of technical issues.
• Administer user accounts and access privileges across corporate systems, including network, email, VoIP, databases, and web applications.
• Supervise the upkeep and functionality of all internet-related equipment and peripherals, ensuring they are up-to-date and operating at optimal performance levels.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's Degree required.
• Experience with AWS preferred.

Pay: Php30,000.00 - Php35,000.00 per month

Benefits:

Supplemental Pay:

Description:

This role shall be in charge of the following:

This role shall have the following skills/experience:
• With at least two (2) years in managing various EdTech platforms
• With experience in digital course authoring tools
